title: Subway Canada 'Meat Cute' Campaign
subtitle: Valentine's Day campaign that achieved 10M+ views and 8M+ engagements
summary: A Valentine's Day campaign featuring blind dates in a Subway location that became a viral sensation, generating over 10 million views across TikTok and Instagram.
challenge: Create a memorable Valentine's Day campaign for Subway Canada that would break through the noise and engage younger audiences on social media.
solution: We partnered with Dentsu Creative to produce 'Meat Cute' - a series of authentic blind dates filmed in a Subway location, combining humor with genuine human connection.
results: Viral success on TikTok and Instagram
Major brand awareness boost for Subway Canada

sections.content: In February 2024, we partnered with Subway Canada and Dentsu Creative to create something special for Valentine's Day. The brief was ambitious: create content that would resonate with Gen Z and millennials while authentically representing the Subway brand.

sections.title: The Challenge
sections.content: How do you make a fast-food brand part of genuine romantic moments without feeling forced or inauthentic?
Our solution was 'Meat Cute' - a play on 'meet cute' that featured real people on blind dates at Subway. The concept was simple but required careful execution to feel authentic rather than staged.

sections.alt: Behind the scenes of Subway Meat Cute campaign
sections.caption: Behind the scenes: Capturing authentic moments during the blind date filming

sections.content: We transformed a Toronto Subway location into a dating environment, carefully balancing the brand presence with the genuine human moments that would drive engagement.

items: Authentic casting for relatable, diverse participants
Carefully planned production design maintaining brand visibility
Social-first editing optimized for TikTok and Instagram

sections.text: The campaign exceeded all expectations. Juniper Island brought creativity and authenticity together in a way that resonated with our target audience.
sections.author: Subway Canada Team

sections.content: The campaign launched in February 2024 and immediately gained traction. The authentic moments and clever concept resonated with audiences, driving massive organic engagement across platforms.

sections.title: Key Insight
sections.content: Viral content happens when brands become part of authentic human moments rather than interrupting them. The best campaigns feel like entertainment, not advertising.

seo.metaTitle: Subway 'Meat Cute' Viral Campaign - 10M+ Views | Juniper Island
seo.metaDescription: How we created a viral Valentine's Day campaign for Subway Canada that achieved 10M+ views and 8M+ engagements on TikTok and Instagram.
